title: Whats the best champion/strategy/tactic you use to get to the back line?
body: This is really just personal interest/curiosity. All opinions welcome.

replies.body: oriana with shaco or zac, delete the squishies

Sion ult plus Ryze ult. 

Best?  Probably not.  Hard to top in sheer awesomeness?  **Definitely**.
+ Nunu Ult + Galio Ult + MF ult. You forgot those.

{{champion:8}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3158}} +10% CDR from runes. 12/18 taking all of the highest damage options. 

{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} + Stormraider's Surge.

Watch their back line pop.

{{champion:2}} {{item:3742}} {{summoner:6}} 

Anything other than blindly charging through the entire enemy team is  cowardice.
Sometimes I swear there is no way to stop a {{champion:62}} from exploding your back line. Even if you drop a pink its often too late.
{{champion:161}} {{champion:115}} I reach their backline all the way from _Our_ backline

I normally just flank the back side, Then again I mostly play assassins.

But flanking is probably the best option. Unless you have a malphite, or someone else with point and click CC
